body_html:
Looks like this is blocked on a bazel bug.
Bazel silently inserts the line "/usr/bin/env python" at the first line of each file.
Sometimes python3 does not get symlinked to "python" and without python2 build fails.
body_text:
Looks like this is blocked on a bazel bug.
Bazel silently inserts the line "/usr/bin/env python" at the first line of each file.
Sometimes python3 does not get symlinked to "python" and without python2 build fails.
body:
Looks like this is blocked on a bazel bug.
Bazel silently inserts the line "/usr/bin/env python" at the first line of each file.
Sometimes python3 does not get symlinked to "python" and without python2 build fails.
